articles.title: Ri Yong Ho Meets Brazilian Ambassador
articles.content:
Ri Yong Ho Meets Brazilian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho met and had a talk with Roberto Colin, Brazilian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him on Wednesday. 
					 The talk positively appreciated the mutual relations which have developed on good terms in economy, culture, sports and other fields and reaffirmed the common will to steadily develop the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries.
					
					 The Brazilian ambassador expressed deep thanks to the government of the DPRK for active help during his term and said that he witnessed reality of the DPRK by taking part in the celebrations for the centenary anniversary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and other events.
					
					 He said that he could know well about the Korean people who are achieving prosperity of the country while overcoming difficulties and ordeals and deeply admired and respected them, hoping that the friendly relations between the two countries will continue to develop favorably. 
					
					 Present at the talk were officials of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK and a member of the Brazilian embassy.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Norwegian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Norwegian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Jan Ole Grevstad, Norwegian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.

articles.title: Officials and Members of Women's Union Tour Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Officials and Members of Women's Union Tour Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
 Samjiyon, June 22 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea toured the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu from June 17 to 22 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung at the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo, Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site, Chongbong Bivouac and the Monument to the Victorious Battle in the Musan Area and on the shore of Lake Samji and the mosaic in the secret camp on Mt. Paektu depicting the three generals of Mt. Paektu and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They went round the command post of the Battle of Pochonbo, police sub-station, the subcounty office and other places in Pochonbo.
					
					 They visited the Chongbong Bivouac and the Konchang Bivouac via the Spring Site in Poso-ri and the Tableland of Junghung and went round the revolutionary relics associated with Kim Il Sung's advance to the homeland.
					
					 They climbed Mt. Paektu after going round the historical relics bearing witness to Kim Jong Il's childhood at his birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp.
					
					 They looked round the groups of subsidiary theme sculptures at the Samjiyon Grand Monument and the revolutionary relics on the shore of Lake Samji.
					
					 After going round various places in Samjiyon Township, they visited the Monument to the Victorious Battle in the Musan Area at the end of their march along the Kapsan-Musan guard road dating back to the days of the Japanese imperialist rule.
					
					 During their tour, they visited the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station and conducted diverse political and cultural activities such as a meeting for hearing impressions of the reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerrillas read by them and poem recitation.

articles.title: Workers and Members of GFTUK Meet
articles.content:
Workers and Members of GFTUK Meet
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- A meeting of workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) took place beside the monument to the sinking of the U.S. imperialist aggressors' ship General Sherman on Wednesday on the occasion of the June 25, the day of struggle against the U.S. imperialists.
					 Present there were Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the GFTUK, officials concerned, officials of trade unions, workers and members of the trade unions.
					
					 Kim Myong Gum who witnessed the atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists made a speech.
					
					 She referred to the mass killings perpetrated by them in Sinchon during the period of the temporary strategic retreat of the Korean People's Army during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 She bitterly condemned the U.S. imperialists as a group of beasts in human skin and sworn enemy with whom one can not live under the same sky.
					
					 The floor was taken by other attendants.
					
					 They said that running high was the Korean people's will to take revenge upon the U.S. imperialists who are still working hard to hamstring the DPRK's efforts to achieve the independent reunification of the country and its prosperity.
					
					 Young speakers declared that in case the U.S. imperialists ignite a war of aggression at any cost, the young people would turn out in a sacred war of justice alongside the People's Army to wipe out the aggressors and turn the den of evils into ashes so that no one may survive on our planet by fighting an unimaginably retaliatory warfare.
					
					 They called for demonstrating once again the stamina and mettle of the heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class in the on-going 200-day campaign in the spirit of dealing a merciless sledge-hammer blow at the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: Green Architecture Applied to Street Construction
articles.content:
Green Architecture Applied to Street Construction
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Advanced energy-conserving, green architectural technology is applied to the construction of Ryomyong Street in Pyongyang.
					 In this regard, Sin Kwang Il, vice-director of a department of the State Academy of Sciences, told KCNA:
					
					 The goal is to turn Ryomyong Street, now under construction, into an energy-saving and green one in the 21st century with domestic efforts and technology.
					
					 Every flat and public building in the street will get air-conditioning and lighting systems by solar heat and geotherm. We have planned to green the roofs and exterior walls of under-40-storied buildings and nurseries and kindergartens and arrange hydroponic hothouses based on a rainwater irrigation system on their rooftops.
					
					 The construction of Ryomyong Street is now making headway in the direction of saving materials as much as possible and protecting ecological environment.
					
					 It is the strong will of its builders to complete the construction within this year and thus demonstrate the Workers' Party of Korea's idea of attaching importance to science and the strength of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Economic and Cultural Development
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Economic and Cultural Development
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- People in North Hwanghae Province of the DPRK have registered many achievements in the economic and cultural development.
					 As part of the efforts for increased power production, it has been pushed forward to check up and repair generators at Ryesonggang Youth Power station Nos.1, 2 and 4, while big efforts are being paid to complete power station Nos. 3 and 5.
					
					 Minor hydraulic power stations with a generating capacity of several thousand kilowatts took their shapes in different parts of the province, including Suan and Rinsan counties.
					
					 Small- and medium-sized collieries are striving to put the production process on a higher level of mechanism.
					
					 And technical improvement is getting momentum at over 20 light industrial establishments like the Jongbangsan General Foodstuff Factory.
					
					 Sariwon Orphans' Primary School and apartment houses for scientists are making their appearances in quick tempo with the renovation of Sariwon Stadium, zoo and Jongbangsan Hotel.

articles.title: Nanotechnology Exhibition in DPRK
articles.content:
Nanotechnology Exhibition in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The Nanotechnology Exhibition, run by the State Nanotechnology Bureau in the DPRK, plays a big role in promoting the development of the nation's nanotechnology.
					On display at the exhibition are more than 1,000 nanotechnology products of over 200 kinds, developed by scientific institutes, educational institutions and production units across the country.
					
					 They include carbon nanotube and nano compound dielectric material, which helps miniaturize and lighten various kinds of electric equipment and considerably lengthen their serviceable life.
					
					 There are also ten-odd kinds of light industrial products made with nano photo-catalysts and nano-germicide for farming, which has already been applied to many units.

articles.title: Traditional Dish of Koreans
articles.content:
Traditional Dish of Koreans
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The Ryugyong Pickle Factory was recently completed in the suburbs of Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 Kimchi is one of typical side dishes of the Korean people, which is characterized by refreshing taste and peculiar flavor.
					
					 Kimchi is known worldwide as one of excellent health foodstuff.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation will wage a more dynamic anti-U.S. struggle to force the U.S. imperialist aggression forces, harasser of peace on the Korean peninsula and root cause of misfortune and pain of the nation, to pull back from south Korea, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 The U.S. imperialist aggression forces' presence in south Korea is a main hurdle blocking the unity of the nation and the cause of national reunification, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The Korean nation's division was attributable to the U.S. troops' presence in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. has disturbed reconciliation and unity between the north and the south and laid big obstacles in the movement for national reunification since its occupation of south Korea, while egging the south Korean ruling quarters onto confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north. 
					
					 It was the U.S. which wire-pulled behind the scene the south Korean conservative forces to seize power in a bid to put a brake on the advance of the June 15 era of reunification. It was again the U.S. that prodded the puppet authorities into throwing a wet blanket over the sincere efforts of the DPRK for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' presence in south Korea should never be allowed as it is a stumbling block lying in the way of unity and reunification of the Korean nation.
					
					 The Korean nation is no longer a weak one which used to be more than a century ago when it fell pray to big powers for its weak national power.
					
					 The U.S. should properly understand the strategic position of the DPRK and face up to the trend of times, roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and withdraw aggression forces from south Korea as early as possible.
					
					 Not only the Korean peninsula but the rest of Northeast Asia can never be in peace as long as the U.S. continues stretching tentacles of interference in the issue of the peninsula while keeping south Korea under its occupation, the article concludes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Roll Back Its Unreasonable Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Roll Back Its Unreasonable Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The option left for the U.S. at present is to roll back its unreasonable hostile policy toward the DPRK. This is the way out for the U.S. and the only option to save its face. Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday says this in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The balance of forces between the DPRK and the U.S. on the Korean peninsula has undergone a dramatic change.
					
					 In the past the U.S. threatened and blackmailed the DPRK with nuclear weapons but the latter is reacting to the former with nuclear deterrent.
					
					 Sanctions and blockade on which the U.S. counts much are proving ineffective.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK has become unworkable. The U.S. has taken much pain to disarm the DPRK but it was in vain.
					
					 The U.S. mainland can never escape from the range of the DPRK's nuclear strike as long as the U.S. pursues its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 If the U.S. dares attack the DPRK, the former's mainland will not escape such disaster as being reduced to debris in face of the latter's nuclear strike of justice.
					
					 Now that the U.S. has become ever more undisguised in pursuing its ill-intended inveterate policy towards the DPRK, the DPRK is left with no other option but to bolster up its nuclear deterrence both in quality and quantity.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK has totally gone bust.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to come to its senses, though belatedly.
					
					 The DPRK remains unchanged in its stand to react to the U.S. moves to stifle it by bolstering its nuclear deterrent.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Regime's Moves to Label DPRK Mastermind of "Cyber Terrorism"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Regime's Moves to Label DPRK Mastermind of "Cyber Terrorism"
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative regime is busy conducting false propaganda against the DPRK, charging it with "cyber terrorism."
					 To cite a typical example, the south Korean puppet police are claiming "the north hacked into information related to national defense" and "the north seems to have long geared up for an attempt at cyber terrorism."
					
					  Commenting on this, Minju Joson Wednesday says:
					
					 The above-said moves of the south Korean regime is nothing but hysteric fit of those hell-bent on escalating confrontation with the DPRK as it is another unpardonable provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 Lurking behind the regime's desperate bid to charge the DPRK with "cyber terrorism" is a cynical ploy to cover up its sinister purpose.
					
					 South Korea earned an ill-fame as the world's worst hotbed of cyber terrorism.
					
					 The south Korean regime is, however, working hard to label the DPRK a cyber terrorist. This proves that the regime stoops to any infamy to block the advance of the DPRK winning a victory after another and stifle it.
					
					 The conservative regime's groundless trumpeting about "the north's cyber terrorism" to get rid of the abyss of uneasiness and quagmire would only trigger off the domestic and foreign public's stronger protest and denunciation of those hell-bent on confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 The regime had better behave itself, bearing in mind that its false propaganda would only bring it the miserable fate of perishing in the trap dug by itself.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Moves for Overseas Aggression
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Moves for Overseas Aggression
 Pyongyang, 22 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, inhabitants in Osaka and Nagasaki prefectures of Japan filed a suit in a court against the Abe regime which railroaded the "security legislation".
					 Hundreds of inhabitants from all walks of life including more than 100 A-bomb victims strongly demanded the immediate repeal of the legislation, declaring that it may mercilessly dampen their desire to live in a peaceful environment and bring another war and nuclear disaster to the country. 
					
					 Minju Joson Wednesday in a commentary says this is an eruption of the people's pent-up resentment at the present ruling forces keen to realize the militarization and launch overseas aggression. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are getting frantic to realize their old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" through overseas aggression, the dream which they failed to do in the last century, but this is no more than a daydream, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Those who sought to dominate the world by invading other nations could not escape their miserable destruction without exception.
					
					 Japan's militarist reinvasion would only lead it to a final ruin, leaving no way of rebirth.
					
					 Well aware of this, public circles and civic organizations of Japan are coming out to judge the government authorities' crimes against the nation.
					
					 Overseas aggression moves sought by the Japanese reactionaries going against the people's mind-set and challenging mankind desirous of peace are bound to face due judgment of history.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to stop at once their reckless actions and saber-rattling, clearly mindful that overseas aggression against other countries and nations would get them nowhere.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Demands Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Demands Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Immediate withdrawal of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and various nuclear war hardware from south Korea presents itself as a more urgent issue at present.
					As already reported, the U.S. introduced latest nuclear attack submarine Mississippi into south Korea on June 13. Not content with this, it staged a nuclear bomb dropping drill in south Korea on June 17 with a formation of B-52H strategic bombers involved.
					
					After creating a touch-and-go situation on the Korean peninsula through the largest-ever anti-north nuclear war racket which lasted for more than 50 days from March last, the U.S. again kicked up war hysteria by hurling its major nuclear strike means into south Korea. This reveals its sinister scenario to mount a nuclear attack on the DPRK any moment.
					
					As proved by the situation, there can neither peace nor security on the Korean peninsula as long as the U.S. pursues a criminal hostile policy toward the DPRK and keeps its troops in south Korea, its vivid expression.
					
					The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and U.S. forces' presence in south Korea are aimed not only to bring down the ideology and social system in the DPRK but to dominate Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					As already blustered by Brzezinski, heavyweight of the U.S. conservative hardliners, the East Asian region including the Korean peninsula is one of the major war theaters set by the U.S. for its world supremacy.
					
					The Korean peninsula, in particular, is a strategic vantage to which the U.S. attaches the greatest importance to contain China and Russia after designating the two big powers as potential rivals.
					
					For this reason the U.S. is working with bloodshot eyes to carry out its Korea strategy by staging large-scale nuclear war exercises targeting it every year with three services of huge aggression troops present in south Korea involved.
					
					But for the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, military tension and the danger of war would not have been created on the Korea peninsula and in the region.
					
					For the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and pull its forces out of south Korea is the top priority task for achieving peace and security.
					
					Nevertheless, the U.S. and other hostile forces are absurdly claiming that "the north's dismantlement of its nukes is the top priority task" for denuclearizing the peninsula and ensuring regional security.
					
					This is no more than sheer sophism intended to pass the buck for strained regional situation to the DPRK and cover up their ambition for domination.
					
					The nuclear force of the DPRK serves as a self-defensive means of justice for protecting the security of the country and the nation from the U.S. imperialists' outrageous moves for aggression.
					
					That is why the DPRK's nuclear force can never be a source of deteriorating the situation.
					
					The U.S. had better stop reeling off the above-said sheer sophism and pull back its aggression troops from south Korea before anything else.

articles.title: Knife Attacker on U.S. Ambassador Sentenced to 12 Years in Prison
articles.content:
Knife Attacker on U.S. Ambassador Sentenced to 12 Years in Prison
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The Seoul High Court of south Korea at the second trial of Kim Ki Jong, representative of the south Korean organization "Uri Madang", held on June 12 sentenced him 12 years in jail, according to the Yonhap News of south Korea. Kim was charged with attacking the U.S. ambassador with a knife.
					 The court upheld the sentence passed on him at the first trial on the absurd charge that he refused to reflect on what he did.

articles.title: Violence Rife at Families of S. Korea
articles.content:
Violence Rife at Families of S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Violence is on the steady increase at families of south Korea where all crimes, immorality and depravity are rampant, according to the Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 According to the information released by the puppet Police Agency, over 40,000 cases of violence occurred at families in 2015 alone or more than double those in the previous year.
					
					 At least 1,000 more cases of violence were reported up to May this year than the cases that occurred in 2014.

articles.title: Truth behind Conspiratorial Spy Case Revealed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Truth behind Conspiratorial Spy Case Revealed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Victims of the spy case of a Korean businessman from Japan fabricated during the past "yusin" dictatorial regime of south Korea were confirmed not guilty on June 19, according to the Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The then puppet Central Intelligence Agency took Kang U Gyu, Korean businessman from Japan, into custody, branding him as a "spy disguised as a member of a Koreans' investment enterprise, and detained ten other citizens on charges of "aiding" him in March 1977. 
					
					 The Agency sentenced Kang to death in June 1977 and others to up to 12 years in prison.
					
					 The victims and their families have waged unrelenting struggle demanding a probe into the truth behind the spy case fabricated by the Agency.
					
					 The Supreme Court in November 2013 admitted that the then Central Intelligence Agency extorted false confession from victims by torture after illegally arresting them, and requested the Seoul High Court to do retrial.
					
					 At the retrial in December 2014, the Seoul High Court pleaded "no ability to prove evidence as for the confession of those accused" and confirmed that all of those charged were not guilty, and the Supreme Court also passed the same judgment.

articles.title: S. Korean Workers Protest against Puppet Authorities' Misrule
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers Protest against Puppet Authorities' Misrule
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The joint measure committee of the trade unions in the public field comprising of the industrial trade unions of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on June 18 in protest against the puppet authorities' misrule against the workers.
					 It was attended by more than 100,000 members of the confederation and the federation.
					
					 At the meeting speakers accused the authorities of carrying out the reform of public institutions to expand the introduction of the system for paying wages according piece rate.
					
					 They chided the regime for imposing the introduction of the above-said system for enforcing the system of forcible retirement aimed at dismissing workers at random after labeling them "workers with poor piece rate." They also slammed it for shifting the blame for the failure of the financial enterprises onto the people and workers.
					
					 They warned the authorities that 400,000 workers would call a general strike unless they would give up the above-said illegal actions.
					
					 At the end of the meeting its participants marched as far as the building of the puppet National Assembly, strongly demanding the immediate repeal of the above-said system and probe into the truth about management crisis in the shipbuilding and shipping business, punishment of the arch criminal, etc.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the United States celebrated the 16th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration in different parts of the U.S., according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 There took place a ceremony in New York on June 11 at which the joint declaration was read out to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers said that Korea should be reunified independently and peacefully in the idea of By Our Nation Itself, the basic spirit of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 They noted that the meeting of the chairmen of the north, the south and overseas of All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration held in mid-May discussed measures to strictly preserve the three principles of national reunification of the July 4 joint statement, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and carry them out to promote the national reconciliation and unity and the improved north-south relations and pave a wide avenue to peace and independent reunification, and to briskly conduct events common to the nation and various solidarity activities.
					
					 They expressed belief that the U.S. Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration would discharge its responsibility and role in the drive for national reunification in firm unity under the banner of the joint declaration.
					
					 They vowed to wage a more dynamic struggle to bring about the second June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 Meanwhile, events including lectures took place in different parts of the U.S.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Works Introduced by Polish Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Works Introduced by Polish Body
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's works "The Workers' Party of Korea is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" and "On the Fundamentals of Revolutionary Party Building" were posted by the Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association on its website on June 17.
					 The first work, published on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), is a great programme for the party building and activities as it reviews with pride the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea which hewed out a new path of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicates the road of developing the party into his party forever.
					
					 The next work, published on October 10, Juche 81 (1992), deals with the historic lesson of building the socialist ruling party and fundamental principle of building the revolutionary party of Juche and clarifies the idea of boosting the internationalist unity and solidarity among the revolutionary parties.

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Introduced by Romanian Party
articles.content:
Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Introduced by Romanian Party
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il was posted by the New Socialist Party of Romania on its website "Juche Idea" on June 17 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious" was published in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House in Russia on June 17 on the occasion of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that the seven decades-long history of the WPK is the one of victory which demonstrated the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. It also indicates the tasks and ways for developing the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il forever.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Meetings and film shows took place in Mexico, Germany and Guinea on June 12 and 14 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Korean films "Flag of WPK" and "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity" were shown.
					
					 The chairman of the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association said in a speech that the WPK held fast to the Juche idea and Songun idea and led to victory the Korean people's struggle for building socialism and defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chief of the Hannover Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Germany noted Kim Jong Il steadily enriched the Juche idea and developed the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea praised Kim Jong Il for building the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung and invincible military ranks.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Personages of Bulgaria, Germany, Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Personages of Bulgaria, Germany, Venezuela
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Bulgaria, Germany and Venezuela on June 14 and 15 on the occasions of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union introduced the brief biography of Kim Jong Il and said he developed the WPK into the revolutionary party of Juche and led the cause of the Juche revolution to victory.
					
					 A vice-chairman of the Federal Republic of Germany-DPRK Association said that the WPK developed into the revolutionary party invariably advancing along the road of socialism without any slightest mistake in shaping lines despite the tempest of history, and the mother party which takes care of the people's destiny in a responsible manner under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il with ardent patriotism opened up the new era for reunification of Korea by providing the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, the vice-chairman added.
					
					 A vice-chairman of the Bolivar Libertador District Council of Venezuela and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the WPK Central Committee was the event of great significance in developing the WPK and building socialism. Under his guidance the DPRK turned into the politico-ideological power and military power and peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world are surely guaranteed, they stressed.

articles.title: Romanian, Egyptian Praise Kim Jong Il for Developing WPK
articles.content:
Romanian, Egyptian Praise Kim Jong Il for Developing WPK
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Romania and Egypt on June 13 and 15 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the New Socialist Party of Romania, in s seminar referred to the main contents of Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung".
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il built the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung both in name and in reality.
					
					 He said that victory and glory are always in store for the WPK shining with the august name of the great leaders.
					
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt and chairman of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association, in a report praised Kim Jong Il for making contribution to developing the WPK.
					
					 He also praised Kim Jong Il formulating the Songun politics into the basic political mode under socialism, cementing the WPK as the political organization leading the cause of the Songun revolution and directing primary efforts to the ideological work.
					
					 He stressed that Kim Jong Il provided the north-south summits and made sure that the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, the programme for implementing it, were adopted and published and thus performed the great feats for national reunification.

articles.title: Nobody Can Match Korean People: Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Nobody Can Match Korean People: Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation brought a radical turn to its destiny and became the strong one which never pardons any aggressor who dares flout its dignity and interests. Now no force on earth can match the just force of the nation.
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said this in an article titled "The U.S. should make crucial decision, squarely facing up to desire of Korean nation and trend of times" posted on its website on June 14.
					
					 The article went on:
					
					 The respected HE Kim Jong Un set forth the most reasonable and realistic line and policies on achieving the independent reunification of Korea by the efforts of the nation at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The line and policies for national reunification are of great significance in settling the issue of the Korean peninsula and ensuring world peace.
					
					 The U.S. should make a decision for rolling back its hostile policy toward the DPRK which should no longer be allowed to go on.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is a blatant challenge to the desire and just cause of the Korean people to defend their idea, social system, sovereignty and right to existence.
					
					 The Korean people's resentment and retaliatory will have reached the phase which can no longer be deterred and their bombs and nuclear warheads are fully charged with the resentment and anger.
					
					 The U.S. should understand that its reckless war exercises and arms buildup against the DPRK will lead the former to its grave.
					
					 The U.S. should not check the fierce trend of the history of the Korean nation advancing toward independence, peace, reconciliation, unity, reunification and prosperity any longer but stop its foolish acts of hurling a handful of pro-U.S. stooges into alienating the Korean nation and inciting confrontation between the north and the south.

articles.title: U.S. Arms Buildup Denounced by German Organization
articles.content:
U.S. Arms Buildup Denounced by German Organization
 Pyongyang, June 22 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany issued a statement on June 18 in denunciation of the U.S. arms buildup against the DPRK.
					 The statement extended full support to a statement issued by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry as regards the U.S. continuous and open arms buildup aimed at military hegemony on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 It said:
					
					 While crying out for other countries' disarmament and denuclearization, the U.S. has gone impudent to increase and modernize not only conventional weapons but also nuclear force with the use of astronomical amounts of fund.
					
					 This reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 Unless the U.S. rolls back its hostile policy toward the independent countries such as the DPRK, peace will never settle in the world.
					
					 The U.S. and its stooges have to be thrown into the dumping ground of history. Only then, genuine peace and stability can be ensured in the world.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador noruego
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador noruego
Pyongyang, 22 de junio (ACNC) -- Jan Ole Grevstad presento el dia 22 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario del Reino de Noruega en la RPDC.
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia maniobras de Japon por agresion a ultramar
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia maniobras de Japon por agresion a ultramar
Pyongyang, 22 de junio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, la prefectura de Osaka y los habitantes de Nagasaki acusaron al juicio el poder de Abe que aprobo la "ley de seguridad".
					Cientos de moradores de varios estratos inclusive mas de 100 victimas de la bomba atomica urgieron abrogar la dicha ley condenando que esta puede pisotear cruelmente el anhelo de ellos a la vida pacifica y obligarles de nuevo la guerra y el desastre nuclear.
					
					El periodico Minju Joson, en un comentario individual fechado 22, senala que esto es la explosion de la colera de la poblacion contra la actual fuerza gobernadora que recurre freneticamente al militarismo y la realizacion de la ambicion por la agresion a ultramar.
					
					A traves de la agresion a ultramar, los reaccionarios japoneses hacen todos los esfuerzos desesperados para realizar el viejo sueno de "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental", subraya el comentario y continua:
					
					Todos los tipejos que intentaban dominar el mundo a costo de la agresion a otras naciones nunca pudieron evitar, sin excepcion, el destino amargo de derrota.
					
					Japon tampoco no podra ser de otra forma. Las maniobras militaristas por la reagresion llevaran a Japon al camino de derrota final nunca recuperable.
					
					Muy conscientes de ello, el amplio circulo social y las entidades civiles de Japon se han levantado en la lucha por juzgar el crimen antinacional de su gobierno.
					
					Las maniobras de agresion a ultramar de los reaccionarios japoneses que dan espalda a la opinion publica y desafian a la humanidad aspirante a la paz seran sentenciadas merecidamente por la historia.
					
					Ellos deben actuar con prudencia y abandonar inmediatamente las imprudentes maniobras belicas al tener presente que la agresion a otros paises y naciones les dejara solo la derrota.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena banda surcoreana por intentar de tildar RPDC de "terrorismo cibernetico"
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena banda surcoreana por intentar de tildar RPDC de "terrorismo cibernetico"
Pyongyang, 22 de junio (ACNC) -- La banda de los conservadores surcoreanos recurre al complot y falsificacion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acusandola de "terrorismo cibernetico".
					 Por ejemplo, la policia surcoreana insiste en que el "Norte hizo hacking sobre los datos concernientes a la defensa nacional" disparateando que "parece que el Norte habia hecho el trabajo previo durante largo tiempo para realizar el terrorismo cibernetico".
					
					  Esto deviene otra provocacion imperdonable contra la RPDC y locura histerica de los enloquecidos por la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual publicado el dia 22 y prosigue:
					
					  La horda conservadora del Sur de Corea se desespera por tildar de "terrorismo cibernetico" a la RPDC, lo cual deviene la artimana vil tendente a encubrir su intento malsano.
					
					  Ahora, el Sur de Corea goza de mala reputacion por el peor nido de crimen de terrorismo cibernetico en el mundo.
					
					  La banda titere, insatisfecha de haber convertido el Sur de Corea en una escena caotica del crimen del terrorismo cibernetico de categoria mundial, pretende calificar a la RPDC de autor de dicho crimen. Esto demuestra que ella actua con frenesi por impedir el avance siempre victorioso de la RPDC y aislarla.
					
					  Cuanto mas la banda conservadora surcoreana cuestione absurdamente a la RPDC para liberarse de la inquietud y la inferioridad, tanto mas causara la mayor protesta y censura del interior y exterior del pais.
					
					  La horda conservadora no debe actuar temerariamente teniendo presente que no evitara el destino tragico de autodestruccion al recurrir a la farsa intrigante de toda indole.

articles.title: Hay que retirar a tropas norteamericanas del Sur de Corea, apunta ACNC
articles.content:
Hay que retirar a tropas norteamericanas del Sur de Corea, apunta ACNC
Pyongyang, 22 de junio (ACNC) -- En los ultimos dias, se presenta como problema mas acuciante la retirada inmediata de las tropas norteamericanas y todo tipo de equipos belicos nucleares emplazados en el Sur de Corea.
					Como ya se informo, EE.UU. introdujo el pasado dia 13 de junio en el Sur de Corea el submarino nuclear Mississippi y el dia 17, perpetro en el cielo sobre el Sur de Corea el ejercicio de lanzamiento de bombas nucleares movilizando la escuadra de bombarderos estrategicos B-52H.
					
					Durante mas de 50 dias desde marzo pasado, EE.UU. habia creado la situacion delicada de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana mediante el simulacro nuclear de maximo tamano en la historia contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y esta vez tambien introdujo en el Sur de Corea sus principales medios de ataque nuclear. Asi demostro mas plenamente la intencion malsana para ejecutar decisivamente el ataque nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					La realidad muestra que la paz y la seguridad nunca pueden implantarse en la Peninsula Coreana y la region mientras existan la criminal politica hostil anti-RPDC y las tropas norteamericanas en el Sur de Corea que forman una de las expresiones directas de la politica hostil anti-RPDC.
					
					Esta politica y las tropas norteamericanas en el Sur de Corea persiguen derrumbar nuestra idea y regimen y a la larga, dominar Asia y el resto del mundo.
					
					Ya hace mucho tiempo, Brzezinski, personaje principal de la fraccion conservadora intransigente, dijo que la region de Asia Oriental inclusive la Peninsula Coreana es una de las principales regiones operativas, determinadas por EE.UU. para la hegemonia mundial.
					
					Sobre todo, para EE.UU. la Peninsula Coreana constituye el importante punto estrategico para mantener a raya China y Rusia, rivales latentes.
					
					Por eso, el imperio estaciona en el suelo surcoreano muchas fuerzas armadas terrestres, navales y aereas y recurre freneticamente al cumplimiento de la estrategia sobre Corea, librando cada ano los simulacros nucleares de gran tamano contra la RPDC.
					
					Si no hubiera existido la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU., no habria aparecido la tension militar y la crisis belica en la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					
					La anulacion de la politica hostil anti-RPDC y la retirada de tropas norteamericanas del Sur de Corea son precisamente tareas apremiantes para el aseguramiento de la paz y la seguridad.
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles lanzan disparates absurdos de que la "renuncia nuclear del Norte (de Corea) es el orden prioritario" para desnuclearizar la peninsula y garantizar la seguridad de la region.
					
					Estas tonterias no pasan de ser una sofisteria cinica para imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad de que ellos mismos agravaron la situacion de la region y para ocultar su ambicion hegemonica.
					
					Nuestras fuerzas armadas nucleares devienen el justo medio autodefensivo para defender la seguridad del pais y la nacion desde las muy brutales maniobras agresivas del imperialismo yanqui, razon por la cual nunca pueden ser la causa de la  agravacion de la situacion.
					
					Antes que nada, EE.UU. tendra que retirar sus tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en el Sur de Corea, sin lanzar disparates absurdos sobre la "anulacion de armas nucleares del Norte".
